4085\_Part\_2.title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Campaign finance I: Mining FEC data
4085\_Part\_2.description: A guide to mining campaign finance data from the Federal Election Commission with tips on reading campaign finance reports, finding and downloading data, and using online tools.
